sentences.sContent: And second, we have to understand that his fans' not minding how he talks is symptomatic of how all of us relate to formality nowadays.
sentences.sContent_eng: And second, we have to understand that his fans' not minding how he talks is symptomatic of how all of us relate to formality nowadays.
sentences.sCn: 第二，我们必须明白，他的支持者并不介意他的说话方式，这一点体现了如今我们所有人对规矩的看法。

trans.tranOther: showing that someone has a particular illness
